hero.title: Real results, not just lines of code
hero.description: Hi, I'm Dante Vilchez. I develop end-to-end web solutions: from the backend you don’t see to the frontend you’ll fall in love with. I’m passionate about building things that are useful, clean, and (mostly) don’t explode. The cherry on top? I’ve got a sense of humor—even when there are bugs.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: Here are some of my recent projects showcasing my web development skills and experience.

projects.title: Connect 4 - Online
projects.description: The classic board game that challenges your strategic skills. Play online with friends or rivals.

projects.title: Movie Reviews
projects.description: A website to watch trailers and get information about movies and series. A learning project using the TMDB API. A reverse proxy was implemented to avoid exposing the API KEY.

projects.title: Incident Management System
projects.description: An incident management system that allows users to manage their incidents in a centralized way.

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.description: Technologies and tools I use to build modern web experiences

about.title: About Me
about.description: I’m a web developer passionate about creating digital experiences...

content.learning-center: Instituto de Educación Superior Privado Cibertec S.A.C

content.description: I actively work on strengthening my interpersonal skills to contribute more effectively in dynamic and team-oriented work environments. These include:

story.label: My Story
story.content: Since I was a child, I’ve had a strong passion for series and movies related to technology. In 2023, I began studying Computer Science and Informatics at Instituto de Educación Superior Privado Cibertec S.A.C, where I’m currently enrolled. That same year, I started self-learning beyond the academic curriculum, diving deeper into various topics on my own.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: Interested in working together? Feel free to reach out via the contact form or connect with me on social media.
